item.title: Luck, Skill or Both: Department Change at IITs
item.description: A friend recently asked me to provide some advice on department change to some freshers. The usual fundaebaazi is something I didn’t want to do; it’s not impressionable, and won’t motivate any fresher to study for a department change. Instead, I chose to show and not tell So is it luck or skill? Short answer: Both. Let’s look at how first year courses are graded. For most theory courses (3 lecture hours + 1 tutorial hour / 2 lab hours), there’s a normal distribution of marks, and the top 7% of people on this distribution get an A.
